channel.title: Common Problems of Computer
channel.description: Now a days computer is getting better, faster and reliable. But the problem of computer is growing up. It is being more user friendly with the developing it's problems. Following are some of most common problem of computer what we discuses right now. Please follow the guidance to fix the error and avoid the major harms. By this you can avoid next headache and make your computer run perfectly. "PC slowdown" To avoid the problem you have to take control of running programs. And have to try to run one at time. After loading your computer programs are set on start up automatically. Now the Question is how can I see the programs which is running? To see this: -Open the start menu and go to run options you can see there is a Dialog Box. -Writer here "msconfig" and press Enter. Then you can see the series of tabs. -Click to startup. Here you can see a list of programs that set to run when your boots. You can select / Deselect the program that application should run or not by the check box. -Make you selection and click ok. Your computer may be ask you to restart. If does, after starting a massage will display that telling you that you have change the start up configurations.

item.title: Common Problems of Computer
item.dc:creator: JamesKane
item.description:
heutenitaz:

Now a days computer is getting better, faster and reliable. But the problem of computer is growing up. It is being more user friendly with the developing it’s problems. Following are some of most common problem of computer what we discuses right now. Please follow the guidance to fix the error and avoid the major harms. By this you can avoid next headache and make your computer run perfectly.
“PC slowdown”
To avoid the problem you have to take control of running programs. And have to try to run one at time. After loading your computer programs are set on start up automatically. Now the Question is how can I see the programs which is running? To see this:
-Open the start menu and go to run options you can see there is a Dialog Box.
-Writer here “msconfig” and press Enter. Then you can see the series of tabs.
-Click to startup. Here you can see a list of programs that set to run when your boots. You can select / Deselect the program that application should run or not by the check box.
-Make you selection and click ok. Your computer may be ask you to restart. If does, after starting a massage will display that telling you that you have change the start up configurations.

We have a forum for specific help,
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/forumdisplay.php?f=10

Read full topic

item.title: Common Problems of Computer
item.dc:creator: heutenitaz
item.description:
Now a days computer is getting better, faster and reliable. But the problem of computer is growing up. It is being more user friendly with the developing it’s problems. Following are some of most common problem of computer what we discuses right now. Please follow the guidance to fix the error and avoid the major harms. By this you can avoid next headache and make your computer run perfectly.
“PC slowdown”
To avoid the problem you have to take control of running programs. And have to try to run one at time. After loading your computer programs are set on start up automatically. Now the Question is how can I see the programs which is running? To see this:
-Open the start menu and go to run options you can see there is a Dialog Box.
-Writer here “msconfig” and press Enter. Then you can see the series of tabs.
-Click to startup. Here you can see a list of programs that set to run when your boots. You can select / Deselect the program that application should run or not by the check box.
-Make you selection and click ok. Your computer may be ask you to restart. If does, after starting a massage will display that telling you that you have change the start up configurations.

Read full topic
